name: Scriptplazza IP Address Script
short_description:
Scriptplazza IP Address Script is a Free PHP What is my IP Address Script that allows your visitors to visit your website and found out their IP address and browser information.

Now you can have your own IP Address site like WhatIsMyIPAddress.com, IP-Adress.com, IP Chicken or WhatisMyIP.com with our simple and clean script.

To run this script on your website you must have a web server with PHP installed, all you have to do is upload the files from download to your site and its ready to run.

Go to http://code.google.com/p/sp-ip-address/
